root: ^"R for roof top" you think. Makes sense.

R1: ^Before you stands a glorious rooftop laboratory…or at least, the remains of it.

^A dark aura shrouds the laboratory as a cold winter wind howls through shattered windows, as if you’re nearing a realm where only shadow reigns. In the desolate atmosphere, a strobe light alarm flashes brightly, illuminating the scene of chaos every other second.
^This is no ordinary floor. And you fear it might be your last one.

s: ^I'm not prepared for this scene yet. I need to know more before I come back.
^...I'm ready for the answers I've been searching for...
